title: When you target a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster with Monster Reincarnation, how does the effect resolve if Stellarknight Constellar Diamond is face-up on the field?
question: When you target a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster with Monster Reincarnation, how does the effect resolve if Stellarknight Constellar Diamond that has Xyz Material attached is face-up on the field?
answer: Monster Reincarnation's effect is an effect that returns a monster from the Graveyard to the hand, so even if you target a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster, the effect of Stellarknight Constellar Diamond will be applied and the targeted monster will be banished instead.
llm_answer: The targeted monster will be shuffled into the Extra Deck. Stellarknight Constellar Diamond's effect does not change the location where the monster is returned.
